title: Software developer
description:
Looking for a Python developer, previous experience not relevant.
Revshare model where a percentage of cumulative time tracked is calculated against total value.
We're making a multitenant card game SaaS and a demo game for web/desktop/mobile. The prototype already exists, the stack is 99% Python
- both Django & Flask
- Celery
- PyGame
- Kivy
- HTMX
- Seahorse (Python transpiler for Solana Anchor smart contracts)
